title: Video game industry 's wealthiest entrepreneurs 2016
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Entrepreneur (company) in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Net worth in billion U.S. dollars 21.9 is found at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and the minimum is found at Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) where Entrepreneur (company) is 3.5.
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Entrepreneur (company) is 18.4.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Entrepreneur (company), and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in each Entrepreneur (company) on the y axis.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and lowest at Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Entrepreneur (company) in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Net worth in billion U.S. dollars 21.9 is found at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and the minimum is found at Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) where Entrepreneur (company) is 3.5.
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Entrepreneur (company) is 18.4.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 5 number of Entrepreneur (company)s.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and lowest at Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).
There is a difference of 18.4 between the maximum Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and minimum Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).

The Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars, followed by William Ding (NetEase), and Shi Yuzhu (Giant Interactive). Down to the Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon) which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in all 5 Entrepreneur (company)s is roughly 9.44.
Summing up the values of all Entrepreneur (company)s, we get total 47.2.
